items.sentence: Tom was in almost every photo in Mary's album.
Tom was a taxi driver when he lived in Boston.
Tom was a heavy drinker before he got married.
Tom wanted Mary and I to do that by ourselves.
Tom very often borrows money from his friends.
Tom used to play baseball when he was younger.
Tom told Mary what he thought the problem was.
Tom talked Mary into helping him wash the car.
Tom asked Mary to keep an eye on his suitcase.
Tom and Mary want to stay for three more days.
Tom and Mary often play table tennis together.
Tom and Mary haven't been here in a long time.
Tom and Mary don't speak French to each other.
Tom and Mary did their homework before dinner.
Tom and Mary decided to go to Boston together.
Tom and I were discussing that just yesterday.
The last time I saw Tom he was wearing a suit.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been told to go home.
Neither Tom nor Mary has a very stressful job.
I heard Tom banging on your window last night.
